__chaos_fault__.description: Dependency version conflict - react@18.3.1 and react-dom@17.0.2 version mismatch
__chaos_fault__.expected-error: ERESOLVE unable to resolve dependency tree - react-dom@17.0.2 requires react@^17.0.2 but react@18.3.1 is installed
__chaos_fault__.note: React and React-DOM major versions must match, otherwise it will cause serious runtime errors or installation failure
